column4: I installed ehcp and put my new site up. when i go to that ip I get the login for ehcp
if i wanted to clear out the var/www    but not mess up  my  ehcp      whats the best way to do that?
I dont actually see anything from ehcp in my var/www
no, when i go to  www.mtsite.com I go to my index.html        when i go to my IP I get my panel to login to echp
but when I ssh into my server, I see all bunch of crap from my old site before i set up ehcp. and cant find my new stuff
what is the command line to do a full search on the system to find my new site? I forgot
just search the whole system for a file
usually a website is stored in the www folder
locate is the easier one to use
i assume you use command line
that's because you have to tell it to look in / and not in your current dir
i don't know how deep ls will enter to your file hirachy
